import React, { Component } from "react"; import Wheel from "./Wheel"; import "./deals.css"; import firebase_integration from "../fire.js"; class Deals extends Component { constructor() { super(); this.places = ["10%", "20%", "30%", "10%", "20%", "30%"]; } render() { firebase_integration.getImageURL( "deal1", "Mehreen", "", "hamburger-beside-fries-2271107.png" ); firebase_integration.getImageURL( "deal2", "Mehreen", "", "hamburger-beside-fries-2271107.png" ); firebase_integration.getImageURL( "dealwheel1", "Mehreen", "", "club-sandwich-served-on-chopping-board-1600711.png" ); const wheel = new Wheel({ el: document.getElementById('Layer_1'), data: ['prize A', 'prize B', 'prize C', 'prize D'], onSuccess(data) { alert(`Congratulations! You picked up ${data.text}`); } }); return (
TRY YOUR LUCK
{/* */}
Avail Discount
Daily Deal
Weekly Deal
); } } export default Deals;
